document_info.issuing_authority: Tahsildar / Sub-Divisional Officer (SDO) — Revenue Department (Taluka/Tehsil Office)
document_info.legal_basis: Revenue Department procedures and service listing under Maharashtra Right to Public Services Act, 2015 (Age, Nationality & Domicile service); relevant departmental GRs and DTE / Employment department rules referencing domicile requirements.
document_info.purpose: To certify that an individual is a resident/domiciled in Maharashtra for purposes such as: state quota / domicile quota in education, state government recruitment / job portals, scholarships and state welfare schemes, reservation/seat allocation in state institutions and other official uses that require proof of long-term residence.
document_info.validity_period: Lifetime (generally treated as lifetime unless a consuming authority explicitly requires a recent certificate); some agencies may require a certificate issued within a specified timeframe (check the receiving authority).
document_info.processing_time_normal: 15 working days (Revenue service listing for Age, Nationality & Domicile certificate under RTS: 15 days).
document_info.helpline_number: 1800-120-8040 (general MahaOnline / Aaple Sarkar helpdesk — use district helplines for local queries)

eligibility.age_requirement: No minimum age — minors may apply through parents / guardians or have domicile based on parents' domicile.
eligibility.residence_requirement:
Standard / commonly applied tests used in Maharashtra:
1) **15 years continuous residence** in Maharashtra OR
2) **Studied for at least 10 years** in educational institutions located in Maharashtra (often accepted as long-term residence proof for students) OR
3) Born in Maharashtra (birth certificate + other proofs) OR
4) Parent(s) domiciled in Maharashtra (for minors). 
(These tests are used across various departments; specific schemes may define alternate or additional conditions.)
eligibility.income_limit: Not applicable for domicile certificate itself (income limits are relevant for schemes such as EWS / scholarships but not for domicile determination).
other_criteria: Applicant should normally apply in the Taluka/Tehsil of residence (jurisdiction based on address proof).
For migrants, continuous residence must be demonstrable by documents spanning the requisite years (bills, school records, voter list, rent agreements, etc.).
Parent's domicile or parent(s) long-term residence in Maharashtra is accepted to grant domicile for minors.
Certain departments (e.g., Higher Education, Employment) may ask for additional documents in prescribed proforma — always check the receiving authority's checklist.
eligibility.who_can_apply: Any Indian citizen who satisfies the residence/domicile criteria (15-year rule, schooling rule, birth in state, or parent domicile). Parents/guardians may apply on behalf of minors.
exclusions: Temporary residents (staying in Maharashtra for short-term work/assignment without evidence of long-term residence).
Persons unable to produce acceptable documentary evidence for the claimed period of residence (subject to revenue officer discretion).

required_documents.specifications: Original for verification and one self-attested copy.
required_documents.notes: Preferred for identity and linkage to mobile for OTPs on Aaple Sarkar.

required_documents.doc_name_en: Proof(s) of long-term residence (to demonstrate 15 years / schooling / birth)
required_documents.doc_name_marathi: दीर्घकालीन वास्तव्याचे पुरावे (15 वर्षे / शिक्षण / जन्म दाखविणारे)
alternatives: School Leaving Certificate / Bonafide Certificate showing years of study in Maharashtra
SSC / HSC mark-sheet indicating school (as evidence of schooling in Maharashtra)
Voter ID entries from earlier years
Bank passbooks / bank statements showing local address across years
required_documents.specifications: Provide as many corroborative documents as possible to prove continuous residence; originals for verification and certified/self-attested copies for submission.
required_documents.number_of_copies: Multiple (1 each of all relevant documents)
required_documents.notes: For school-based proof the DTE and many district authorities accept 10 years of schooling in Maharashtra as sufficient evidence for domicile for students.

required_documents.specifications: Originals for verification; self-attested copy to be attached.
required_documents.notes: Used frequently to establish domicile for applicants below 18 or where applicant's long-term records are unavailable.

required_documents.specifications: Signed declaration about residence history; online applicants must complete the portal form and upload documents.
required_documents.notes: Use the latest form/checklist from Aaple Sarkar or district portal.

required_documents.specifications: Passport-size photograph if required by local office.
required_documents.notes: Some Tehsil offices ask for one or two photographs for record.

steps.step_description_en: Create an account on Aaple Sarkar (use mobile number and Aadhaar/ID for verification) or login using existing credentials.
steps.step_description_marathi: Aaple Sarkar वर खाते तयार करा (मोबाईल नंबर व आधार/ओळखसह) किंवा विद्यमान खाते वापरा.
steps.tips: Use the mobile number linked to Aadhaar for smooth OTP verification; keep ID documents handy.
steps.common_errors: Mismatched name/address vs identity proof leading to delays.

steps.step_title_en: Select Service — Age, Nationality & Domicile (or Domicile only if listed)
steps.step_title_marathi: सेवा निवडा — वय, राष्ट्रीयत्व आणि अधिवास
steps.step_description_en: Choose the correct service on the portal (Age, Nationality & Domicile or Domicile Certificate) and start a new application.
steps.step_description_marathi: पोर्तलवर योग्य सेवा निवडा (वय, राष्ट्रीयत्व व अधिवास) आणि नवीन अर्ज सुरू करा.
steps.tips: Read the checklist on the service page before starting to avoid missing documents.
steps.common_errors: Selecting wrong service; not checking category-specific checklist.

steps.step_title_marathi: अर्ज भरा व वास्तव्याचा इतिहास द्या
steps.step_description_en: Enter personal details, addresses and dates of residence/study, parent details (if applicable) and declare the basis for domicile (15 years / schooling / birth).
steps.step_description_marathi: वैयक्तिक माहिती, पत्ते व वास्तव्य/शिक्षणाची तारीख भरा, पालक माहिती भरा (अवलंबून असल्यास) व अधिवासाचा आधार निवडा (15 वर्षे / शाळा / जन्म).
steps.tips: Use exact dates from documents (school certificates, bills) to avoid mismatches.
steps.common_errors: Inconsistent dates between documents and the form.

steps.step_description_en: Upload scanned copies of identity, address, school records, utility bills, birth certificate, parental domicile etc. as required by checklist.
steps.step_description_marathi: ओळख, पत्ता, शाळेची नोंद, वीज बिल, जन्म प्रमाणपत्र, पालकांचे अधिवास इत्यादी स्कॅन केलेल्या प्रत्या अपलोड करा.
steps.tips: Scan pages clearly, keep file sizes within portal limits, and name files correctly for easy verification.
steps.common_errors: Blurry scans, wrong file formats, files exceeding size limit.

steps.step_title_marathi: फी भरा (लागू असल्यास) व सबमिट करा
steps.step_description_en: Pay statutory/portal fee and submit application. Save the acknowledgement / application number for tracking.
steps.step_description_marathi: नियोजित/पोर्टल फी भरा व अर्ज सबमिट करा. ट्रॅकिंगसाठी पावती/अर्ज क्रमांक जतन करा.
steps.tips: Take screenshot of payment receipt and acknowledgement.
steps.common_errors: Payment failure without saving receipt; not noting application number.

steps.step_description_en: Revenue staff (clerical officer, Awwal Karkun, Talathi) and Tahsildar verify documents. Field verification may be ordered if required. Applicant may be asked for additional proof or clarifications.
steps.step_description_marathi: महसूल कर्मचारी (क्लर्क, अावल कारकुन, तालाठी) व तहसिलदार कागदपत्रे तपासतात. आवश्यक असल्यास फील्ड पडताळणी केली जाऊ शकते. अर्जदाराला अतिरिक्त पुरावे मागवले जाऊ शकतात.
steps.tips: Respond promptly to calls/online messages from the taluka office to avoid delays.
steps.common_errors: Ignoring office queries or not supplying originals when requested.
steps.estimated_time: Varies; part of RTS 15-working day timeline

steps.step_description_en: On approval, certificate is digitally signed / issued by the Tahsildar and made available for download on the portal or for collection from the tehsil office.
steps.step_description_marathi: मान्यतेनंतर तहसीलदार द्वारा प्रमाणपत्रावर डिजिटल स्वाक्षरी केली जाते व पोर्टलवरून डाउनलोडसाठी किंवा तहसील कार्यालयातून घेण्यासाठी उपलब्ध होते.
steps.tips: Verify certificate details (name, address, DOB) immediately and request correction if needed.
steps.common_errors: Not verifying the issued certificate for errors.

application_process_online.documents_upload_format: PDF / JPG (portal-specific file-size limits; commonly 2-5 MB per file).
application_process_online.payment_gateway: Netbanking / Debit/Credit Card / UPI (portal dependent). Some Seva Kendras may accept cash/card for facilitation charges.

application_process_offline.form_number: Standard 'Age, Nationality & Domicile' application form used by Revenue Department (taluka-specific hardcopy available)
application_process_offline.where_to_get_form: Tehsil / Tahsildar Office, District Collectorate, or download PDF/checklist from Aaple Sarkar / district portal
application_process_offline.form_download_url: [https://aaplesarkar.mahaonline.gov.in/en](https://aaplesarkar.mahaonline.gov.in/en) (service page and PDF checklist available on portal / district websites)

steps.step_description_en: Get the latest application form and checklist from the Tahsildar office or district website; confirm required proofs for your category (student/minor/migrant).
steps.step_description_marathi: तहसीलदार कार्यालय किंवा जिल्हा वेबसाइटवरून नवीनतम अर्ज फॉर्म व तपासणी यादी घ्या; आपल्या श्रेणीसाठी आवश्यक पुरावे (विद्यार्थी/अल्पवयीन/स्थळांतरित) पुष्टी करा.
steps.tips: Ask counter staff for any district-specific additional proofs.
steps.common_errors: Using outdated form or missing a district-specific requirement.

steps.step_description_en: Complete the physical form, attach self-attested photocopies of identity, residence, school records, birth certificate or parent domicile as applicable; keep originals for verification.
steps.step_description_marathi: फिजिकल फॉर्म पूर्ण करा, ओळख, वास्तव्य, शाळेची नोंद, जन्म प्रमाणपत्र किंवा पालकांचे अधिवास इत्यादींच्या स्वयं-प्रमाणित प्रती जोडा; मूळ कागदपत्रे पडताळणीसाठी ठेवा.
steps.tips: Organize documents chronologically to help the verifying officer.
steps.common_errors: Missing signature, incomplete addresses, or missing annexures.

steps.step_description_en: Submit at the revenue counter, pay the statutory fee (if any), and obtain the acknowledgement receipt containing application number for tracking.
steps.step_description_marathi: महसूल काउंटरवर सादर करा, नियमानुसार फी भरा (अगर लागेल) आणि ट्रॅकिंगसाठी अर्ज क्रमांक असलेली पावती घ्या.
steps.tips: Retain the receipt and note the officer's name for follow-up.
steps.common_errors: Failing to take acknowledgement or noting wrong application number.

steps.step_description_en: Office verifies documents; field verification may be carried out. Once approved, collect the certificate or download if district provides e-issuance.
steps.step_description_marathi: कार्यालय कागदपत्रे तपासते; फील्ड पडताळणी केली जाऊ शकते. मान्य झाले की प्रमाणपत्र घ्या किंवा जिल्हा ई-इश्यू असल्यास डाउनलोड करा.
steps.tips: If asked for additional documents, submit promptly to avoid delays.
steps.common_errors: Delaying submission of additional proofs when asked.

fees_structure.exemptions: Some categories (e.g., BPL or designated welfare categories) may be exempt from service charges per district circulars; check local notices.
Some districts may waive fees for students or BPL on production of valid proof (district-specific).

fees_structure.fee_amount: Varies (facility/handling charges charged by private/third-party Seva Kendras; example amounts reported in media vary)
fees_structure.exemptions: These are non-statutory facilitation charges — check centre disclosure.

district_variations.variations: Urban verification is typically stricter — municipal/utility/municipal property tax records and voter lists are frequently used. Some services may involve Municipal Corporation counters or ward offices for address corroboration.
special_requirements: Recent municipal/utility bill or property tax receipt
School records showing attendance in Mumbai schools (if using schooling route)
district_variations.different_fees: No statutory change, but facilitation charges at Seva Kendras/municipal counters may vary.
district_variations.different_offices: Ward office / BMC assistance counters may assist with verification.
district_variations.notes: Metropolitan job portals and schemes may require explicit Mumbai domicile/borough-specific criteria — check scheme notifications.

district_variations.variations: Educational records (school/college bonafide) are commonly accepted as strong proof — many institutions requiring domicile will explicitly accept SSC/HSC / school bonafide certificates.
special_requirements: Bonafide certificate from school/college for applicants relying on schooling evidence
district_variations.different_offices: Taluka Tahsildar; some municipal civic facilitation counters.
district_variations.notes: DTE and technical education admissions widely accept school-based domicile proofs in Pune region.

district_variations.variations: District pages and tehsils accept combination of utility bills, voter lists and school records; field verification used in doubtful cases.
special_requirements: Voter list entries and electricity bills over the years
district_variations.different_offices: Taluka/Tahsildar office and Collectorate verification cell where applicable.
district_variations.notes: Applicants coming from other states may need more documentary corroboration.

district_variations.variations: Rural talukas rely more on Gramsevak/Talathi attestations, school records, land records (khasra) for long-term residence proof.
special_requirements: Gramsevak / revenue village records or land records
district_variations.different_offices: Taluka Tahsildar office; Gramsevak attestations in village-level matters
district_variations.notes: Field verification common in rural domicile determinations.

district_variations.variations: Urban-rural mix; municipal tax receipts or tenancy agreements are often used in urban pockets while rural pockets use revenue records/schooling evidence.
special_requirements: Property tax receipt / rent agreement / voter ID
district_variations.different_offices: Taluka Tehsil office; Municipal facilitation centers sometimes act as intermediaries.
district_variations.notes: Thane urban localities may require multiple corroborative documents.

offices.address: Collectorate / Tahsildar Complex (Exact address varies by ward/taluka; check Municipal/Taluka website)
Tahsildar / Collectorate Complex, Pune (see district portal for exact location)
Tahsildar Office, Nagpur District Collectorate (refer district website for exact address)
Tahsildar Office, Nashik District Collectorate (check district portal for exact location)
Tahsildar / Collectorate building (refer district portal for exact address)

faqs.question_en: What is the minimum residence requirement for domicile in Maharashtra?
faqs.question_marathi: महाराष्ट्रात अधिवासासाठी किमान वास्तव्याची अट किती आहे?
faqs.answer_en: Commonly used test: 15 years continuous residence in Maharashtra. For students, 10 years of schooling in Maharashtra is often accepted as domicile proof. Birth in Maharashtra is also a valid basis.
faqs.answer_marathi: सामान्यतः वापरली जाणारी अट: महाराष्ट्रात सतत 15 वर्षांचे वास्तव्य. विद्यार्थ्यांसाठी महाराष्ट्रात 10 वर्षे शिक्षण हा अधिवास पुरावा म्हणून स्वीकारला जातो. महाराष्ट्रात जन्म हेही वैध आधार आहे.

faqs.question_en: Can I use my school records as proof of domicile?
faqs.question_marathi: मी माझे शाळेचे नोंदी अधिवास पुराव्यासाठी वापरू शकतो का?
faqs.answer_en: Yes — SSC/HSC mark-sheets, school leaving certificates or bonafide certificates showing years of study in Maharashtra are commonly accepted evidence, especially for students.
faqs.answer_marathi: होय — Maharashtra मध्ये शाळेत शिकण्याचे वर्ष दाखवणारे SSC/HSC मार्कशीट, शाळा सोडण्याचे प्रमाणपत्र किंवा बोनाफाइड प्रमाणपत्र सामान्यतः मान्य केले जातात, विशेषतः विद्यार्थ्यांसाठी.

faqs.question_en: Does being born in Maharashtra automatically give me domicile?
faqs.question_marathi: महाराष्ट्रातील जन्म असणे मला आपोआप अधिवास देतं का?
faqs.answer_en: Birth in Maharashtra is strong evidence of domicile, but offices may still ask for corroborative documents (birth certificate + proof of parents' residence) in some cases.
faqs.answer_marathi: महाराष्ट्रात जन्म हा अधिवासाचा बळकट पुरावा आहे, परंतु काही प्रकरणांमध्ये कार्यालये आणखी समर्थन पुरावे (जन्म प्रमाणपत्र + पालकांचा वास्तव्य पुरावा) मागू शकतात.

faqs.question_en: Can migrants obtain domicile after moving to Maharashtra?
faqs.question_marathi: इतर राज्यातून स्थलांतर केल्यानंतर व्यक्ती महाराष्ट्रात अधिवास मिळवू शकते का?
faqs.answer_en: Yes — migrants can be granted domicile if they can show continuous residence for the required period (15 years) or otherwise satisfy the schooling/parental criteria. Documentary proof across years is crucial.
faqs.answer_marathi: होय — स्थलांतरित व्यक्ती आवश्यक कालावधीचे (15 वर्षे) वास्तव्य दाखवून किंवा शिक्षण/पालकांच्या निकष पूर्ण करून अधिवास मिळवू शकतात. वर्षांनिहाय कागदपत्रे महत्वाची असतात.

faqs.question_en: Is domicile certificate mandatory for state government jobs / portals?
faqs.question_marathi: राज्य शासनाच्या नोकऱ्या / पोर्टलसाठी अधिवास प्रमाणपत्र अनिवार्य आहे का?
faqs.answer_en: Many state job notifications and the state job portal require domicile proof; the Government has made domicile mandatory in some recruitment/portal contexts. Check the specific recruitment/portal notification for exact requirements.
faqs.answer_marathi: अनेक राज्य नोकरी सूचना व राज्य नोकरी पोर्टल अधिवास पुरावा मागतात; काही भरती/पोर्टल संदर्भांत अधिवास अनिवार्य केला गेला आहे. नेमक्या आवश्यकतांसाठी संबंधित सूचना तपासा.

faqs.answer_en: Typically 15 working days as per Revenue service listing under RTS; cases requiring field verification may take longer.
faqs.answer_marathi: सर्वसाधारणपणे RTS अंतर्गत महसूल सेवा सूची नुसार 15 कार्यदिवस; फील्ड पडताळणी असलेल्या प्रकरणांना जास्त वेळ लागू शकतो.

common_issues.solution_en: Submit multiple corroborative documents (school records, old utility bills, voter entry, bank passbooks, rent agreements) spanning the required period; provide parents' domicile if applicant is minor.
common_issues.solution_marathi: आवश्यक कालावधी दर्शवणारी अनेक प्रमाणभूत कागदपत्रे सादर करा (शाळा नोंदी, जुन्या वीज बिल, मतदार यादी, बँक पासबुक, भाडे करार) ; अर्जदार अल्पवयीन असल्यास पालकांचे अधिवास द्या.
common_issues.prevention_tips: Collect chronological proofs and organize them before applying.

common_issues.issue_description_en: Mismatch between dates on different documents (school vs bills)
common_issues.issue_description_marathi: विभिन्न कागदपत्रांवरील तारखांमध्ये विसंगती (शाळा व बिल)
common_issues.solution_en: Provide an affidavit explaining the chronology and attach additional corroborative records; request officer to consider schooling evidence where consistent.
common_issues.solution_marathi: कालक्रम स्पष्ट करणारे शपथनामा द्या व अतिरिक्त समर्थन नोंदी संलग्न करा; जिथे शालेय पुरावे सुसंगत असतील तिथे ते विचारात घेण्याची विनंती करा.
common_issues.prevention_tips: Ensure consistency in dates or prepare a clear annotated chronology of residence.

common_issues.solution_en: Convert to accepted formats (PDF/JPG), compress files to meet size limits and retry; approach district helpdesk if persistent.
common_issues.solution_marathi: स्वीकारलेल्या फॉरमॅटमध्ये (PDF/JPG) रूपांतर करा, फाइल साईझ मर्यादेत आणण्यासाठी संकुचित करा आणि पुन्हा प्रयत्न करा; समस्या कायम असल्यास जिल्हा हेल्पडेस्कला संपर्क करा.
common_issues.prevention_tips: Scan at recommended DPI and check portal instructions for file-size limits before uploading.

common_issues.issue_description_en: Requests for additional field verification causing delays
common_issues.issue_description_marathi: अतिरिक्त फील्ड पडताळणीसाठी विनंत्या ज्यामुळे उशीर
common_issues.solution_en: Cooperate with field officers, provide required originals and local attestations timely; use RTS escalation if delays exceed statutory timeline.
common_issues.solution_marathi: फील्ड अधिकाऱ्यांशी सहकार्य करा, आवश्यक मूळ कागदपत्रे व स्थानिक प्रमाणपत्र वेळेत द्या; कायद्याने ठरविलेले वेळेपेक्षा जास्त विलंब झाल्यास RTS एस्केलेशन वापरा.
common_issues.prevention_tips: Provide strong documentary evidence up-front to reduce need for field checks.

common_issues.solution_en: Consult the local Tahsildar office before applying to understand accepted proof mix (e.g., rent + employment records + school records); gather as many corroborative proofs as possible.
common_issues.solution_marathi: अर्ज करण्यापूर्वी स्थानिक तहसीलदार कार्यालयाशी सल्ला घ्या आणि स्वीकारले जाणारे पुरावे समजून घ्या (उदा. भाडे + नोकरी नोंदी + शाळा नोंदी); शक्य तितके समर्थन पुरावे गोळा करा.
common_issues.prevention_tips: Visit taluka counter for pre-check of documents.

tracking_information.tracking_method: Application number / Mobile number (OTP) via Aaple Sarkar or district e-service tracking pages
tracking_information.estimated_response_time: 15 working days (typical); may be longer if field verification or additional scrutiny is required

grievance_redressal.complaint_portal: [https://aaplesarkar.mahaonline.gov.in/en](https://aaplesarkar.mahaonline.gov.in/en) (Aaple Sarkar contact & grievance functions) and district collectorate grievance portals
grievance_redressal.complaint_helpline: 1800-120-8040 (MahaOnline / Aaple Sarkar support) — use district collector / Tahsildar helplines for local escalation (numbers on district portals).
grievance_redressal.complaint_email: DATA_NOT_AVAILABLE (use district/district-collectorate/revenue office emails published on official district portals)
grievance_redressal.escalation_process: 1) Approach the issuing Tahsildar / Nayab Tahsildar with acknowledgement; 2) First appeal to Sub-Divisional Officer (SDO) / First Appellate Officer as per RTS; 3) Second appeal to Additional Collector / Collector as per RTS/GR; 4) Use state grievance / RTI / legal remedy if administrative appeals do not resolve the matter.
grievance_redressal.ombudsman_details: DATA_NOT_AVAILABLE (use district collectorate / state-level grievance channels as appropriate)

additional_notes.recent_changes: Digitization via Aaple Sarkar has standardized much of the workflow; Revenue Department published a Fees/Procedure/Checklist PDF for Age, Nationality & Domicile services with RTS timeline (15 days) and a nominal fee. Departments like DTE and Mahadbt explicitly list domicile certificate as a required document for admissions and beneficiary schemes.
additional_notes.seasonal_variations: Rush during college admission windows (May–Aug) and recruitment drives; expect longer processing times during these peak periods.
additional_notes.special_provisions: Special facilitation for students, elderly or physically challenged individuals via Seva Kendras or doorstep delivery schemes in some talukas; minors can derive domicile from parents' domicile certificate.
related_documents: Income Certificate (for schemes where both domicile and income criteria apply)
Birth Certificate (useful to prove Maharashtra birth)
School / College Bonafide / Mark sheets (SSC/HSC) — often accepted as residence proof for students
useful_links: Aaple Sarkar — Age, Nationality & Domicile service / application and checklist
Directorate of Technical Education (DTE) — admission brochures listing domicile as required document
MahaDBT and other departmental scheme pages citing domicile certificate requirement

sources.source_name: Aaple Sarkar — Age, Nationality & Domicile service listing (Revenue Department)
Aaple Sarkar — Fees, Procedure & Checklist (Age, Nationality & Domicile) (Revenue Department PDF)
Directorate of Technical Education (DTE) Maharashtra — Diploma / Admission brochures referencing Domicile Certificate requirement
MahaDBT scheme listing (example) — domicile certificate as required document for scheme beneficiaries
Government of Maharashtra — Employment / 'Local person' definition (15 years residence) in departmental documentation
Satara District — Age, Nationality & Domicile service (example district checklist showing acceptable proofs)
Times of India (archive) — reporting on domicile rules and acceptance of school leaving certificate for students
sources.reliability: High (reputable news; used to illustrate common practice of school records as proof)
